document.full_text: a reputed neo-nazi accused of planting a backpack bomb discovered along the route of a martin luther king jr. day parade pleaded not guilty on monday to newly filed charges of committing hate crimes.
document.title: mlk day bomb plot suspect pleads innocent to hate crimes
lines_and_colors: a reputed neo-nazi accused of planting a backpack bomb discovered along the route of a martin luther king jr. day parade pleaded not guilty on monday to newly filed charges of committing hate crimes.
